repositories.brief_summary: Active week with multicore performance investigations, runtime improvements, and new language features under discussion.
repositories.overall_activity:

- [Olivier Nicole](https://github.com/OlivierNicole) identified **data race conditions** in ephemeron cleaning during minor GC, discovered through ThreadSanitizer testing ([#14061](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14061))
- [Hari Hara Naveen S](https://github.com/Johan511) fixed **TSan function signature conflicts** with GCC 15.1 for `__tsan_func_exit` ([#14065](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14065))

repositories.ongoing_summary: Major type system enhancement and language features advancing through review and implementation phases.
repositories.ongoing_projects:
- **Transparent ascription implementation** by [Clément Blaudeau](https://github.com/clementblaudeau) introducing dynamic aliases and module signature improvements, representing step 1 of the transparent ascription RFC ([#14064](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/pull/14064))
- **Modular explicits documentation** by [Gabriel Scherer](https://github.com/gasche) providing comprehensive manual updates for module-dependent functions and first-class modules, awaiting merge of the core implementation ([#14048](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/pull/14048))

- **Field getter syntax proposal** by [@malekbr](https://github.com/malekbr) introducing `(.foo)` as syntactic sugar for record field access functions ([#14042](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/pull/14042))
repositories.priority_summary: Runtime stability fixes and debugging improvements requiring attention from multicore and GC specialists.
repositories.priority_items:
- **Multicore runtime optimization** investigation needed for substantial lock wait times affecting domain-based parallelization in real-world applications like Infer static analysis ([#14047](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14047))
- **Thread safety fixes** for ephemeron data race in `ephe_clean_minor` during stop-the-world garbage collection synchronization ([#14061](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/issues/14061))
- **Short-paths nontermination bug** with recursive modules requiring expert review of proposed cycle detection fix by [Brandon Stride](https://github.com/brandonzstride) ([#14037](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/pull/14037))
